contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox software | name = Gnopernicus | logo = | screenshot = | caption = | collapsible = | author = | developer = | released = <!-- {{Start date|YYYY|MM|DD}} --> | latest release version = | latest release date = | latest preview version = | latest preview date = | frequently updated = | programming language = | operating system = [[Linux]] | platform = | size = | language = | status = | genre = [[Screen reader]] | license = | website = }} {{Portal|Free software}} '''Gnopernicus''' is a [[free software|free]] [[GNOME]] desktop application that provides [[assistive technology|Assistive Technologies]] (AT) for [[blindness|blind]] and [[visually impaired]] users. SRCore is the component of Gnopernicus [[screen reader]], that gathers information from all input sources, organize it and then presents it to the three outputs: [[Braille]], [[Speech communication|Speech]], [[Screen magnifier|Magnifier]]. Gnopernicus is now obsolete and has been superseded by [[Orca (assistive technology)|orca]]. [[Category:Free screen readers]] [[Category:GNOME]] {{GNOME-stub}}
